recipesJson.name: Premium Pineapple Cream
recipesJson.author: MixandHope
recipesJson.description: This was super great off the shake and has just bloomed with flavor,, a perfect pineapple combo, the Lemon and Yogurt really makes that Pineapple shine,  Perfect amount of Cream,  giving this vape a dense sweet Pineapple  taste. I did add .10 of PUR super sweet.  Give it a mix,  a all day vape for me.

reviews.text: Wow!! Just the right amount of funk so that you know it's actually pineapple and not just some indiscernible sweet fruit. This truly is very very well balanced, creamy fruits are my ADVs and since I am strawberry and watermelon mute/blind I've been branching out the past several months. This is definitely something I can taste really well and is balanced in such you can pick up on all elements of the profile. Will mix again thank you!!!
